00011 W.events = {};
00012 
00013 
00033 W.event = function(source, event, func, arg1){
00034     var task;
00035     // create a new library for this object if there no exist yet.
00036     if(!W.events[source])
00037         W.events[source] = {};
00038     if(!W.events[source][event]){
00039         // create a new library for this event if there no exist yet.
00040         W.events[source][event] = [];
00041         // extend the original event handler
00042         source[event] = function(){
00043             // execute reserved tasks
00044             for(var i = 0; i < W.events[source][event].length; ++i){
00045                 task = W.events[source][event][i];
00046                 // BUG: Error on firefox, onresize
00047                 task[0](task[1]);
00048             }
00049         };
00050     }
00051     W.events[source][event][W.events[source][event].length] = [func, arg1];
00052 };
